sentences.en: Boundaries of the polygon may extend to infinity.
sentences.cn: 多角形的边界可以延伸到无穷远处.

sentences.en: Curves running from the origin to infinity may serve as branch cuts.
sentences.cn: 从原点至无穷远处的曲线起分支割痕的作用.

sentences.en: In the equation below, as E goes to zero, n approaches infinity.
sentences.cn: 在下面的方程式中，E趋向于零时，n接近无穷大。

sentences.en: In this weather the cliff face was a foggy drop into infinity.
sentences.cn: 在这种天气条件下,雾蒙蒙的悬崖隐入广漠无限之中.

sentences.en: It is impossible to count up to infinity.
Numbers go on forever to infinity.
sentences.cn: 数字可以永远地数下去,直到无穷.

sentences.en: The bald, bare landscape widened about him to infinity.
sentences.cn: 赤裸裸 、 光秃秃的景色在他眼下一直伸展到无边无际的远方.

sentences.en: The camera is focused at infinity.
sentences.cn: 照相机的聚焦被调节在无限远这一档上.

sentences.en: The far point of a normal eye is at infinity.
sentences.cn: 正常眼的远点在无穷远处.

sentences.en: The fields covered with snow became a vast expanse of whiteness stretching to infinity.
sentences.cn: 田野被大雪覆盖,白茫茫的一眼望不到边.

sentences.en: Theoretically, a line can extend into infinity.
sentences.cn: 从理论上来说直线可以无限地延伸.

sentences.en: There is always an infinity of numbers between any two numbers.
sentences.cn: 任何两个数字之间都存在无穷多的数字。
这些排列可以增加到无穷大。

sentences.en: They had an infinity of adventures.
This eliminates reflections from infinity, as one expects physically.
sentences.cn: 正如物理上所预期的,这就消除了来自无穷远处的反射.
